item.title: Scams in the name of courier companies
item.description: There’s a new scam in the name of FedEx, Blue Dart, and other courier companies that you need to be aware of ðŸ‘‡ A colleague got a call from a person claiming to be from FedEx saying that a parcel had been confiscated by the police because drugs were found in it. Since he was expecting a courier from an e-commerce platform, he panicked. He then got a video call from someone claiming to be the police and issued this official-looking letter.
